subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The English soccer world will have to decide how they want to deal with Flavio Briatore, who was excommunicated from the world of Formula One on Monday, and who is also the chairman of the Queens Park Rangers in west London.
snippet: The English soccer world will have to decide how they want to deal with Flavio Briatore, who was excommunicated from the world of Formula One on Monday, and who is also the chairman of the Queens Park Rangers in west London.
